group_1.narration: With my father's guidance, I carved@my very first wooden coaster.
He praised me a lot, so I was very happy.
"You're giving it to me? Thank you, Mayu."
"Will you take this in return?@I carved a bear pendant for you."
Even now, I treasure the pendant@my father gave me.
Since he died, it's one of the few precious@items I have left to remember him by.

group_1.textCenter: (I had to return a lost item, and now I'm@running late.)
(I'll barely make it to work on time.)
(I really wanted to get there early today to@prepare for the special exhibit.)
I apologize for arriving last minute like@this.

group_1.textRight: Director, I'm telling you, it must've been@Mayu.

group_1.textLeft: Don't say that. It's not good to be @suspicious of your colleagues.

group_1.textRight: But the security footage shows her friend@immediately after the postcard disappears.

group_1.textLeft: Now, now, calm down. That doesn't mean@Mayu was involved.

group_1.textRight: Um, did something happen? What postcard?@You don't mean...

group_1.textLeft: That's right. Master Mone's hand-drawn@postcard was stolen.

group_1.narration: Master Mone.@A genius artist of Kamihama.
When he was alive, he had a good@relationship with the Kamihama@Contemporary Art Museum and even@sent them a hand-drawn postcard.
That postcard was the museum's most@prized possession and a source@of pride for us employees as well.

group_1.textRight: The visitors always look forward to seeing@it.

group_1.textLeft: Do you know anything about this, Mayu?

group_1.textRight: Uh, know what? Like who the thief is?

group_1.textLeft: See, she has nothing to do with it.
The way the postcard suddenly disappeared...@That's not something anyone could do.

group_1.textRight: ...that Mayu's friend was caught on the@security camera immediately after the theft.

group_1.textLeft: But she appeared after it was stolen, so I'm@still not convinced that she was involved.
The police are here investigating. Would you@mind looking at the footage too, Mayu?

group_1.narration: The security video showed the postcard@vanishing, and then a girl rushing into the@room before promptly leaving.
She was wearing a Mizuna Girls' Academy@uniform. A blond girl with pigtails.@She seemed to have a dignified posture.

group_1.textRight: You're right... I think that's Ria.
Uh, but...she appeared after it was stolen, so@it's probably just a coincidence, right?
Besides, Ria isn't the kind of person who@steals!

group_1.textLeft: However, we have to inform the police that@the girl in the footage is Reesa.
Well, sorry to send you home after you came@all this way.
But we're closed for the rest of today and@tomorrow while the police investigate.

group_1.textCenter: (I can't get in touch with Ria.)
(I saw the footage of the postcard getting@stolen.)
(It really did disappear in an instant,@almost like magic.)
I-it can't be! Did a Witch do this?
(That would mean Ria was chasing after a@Witch.)
(And the reason I can't get in touch...)
I have to look for her!
A theft at the museum is troubling on@its own.
But that was only the beginning...
